DB.name: Disco Bee
DB.desc: Setiap ~20 menit, memiliki peluang 12.28% untuk mengaktifkan mutasi Disco (nilai 125x) pada buah terdekat.

QB.name: Queen Bee
QB.desc: Setiap ~25 menit, menerapkan mutasi Pollinated pada buah di sekitar dan mengatur ulang cooldown kemampuan pet lain.

Redfox.name: Red Fox
Redfox.desc: Mencuri (mendupilasi) benih dari kebun pemain lain (khusus dari Seed Shop).

Red Fox (Random).name: Red Fox (Random)
Red Fox (Random).desc: Mencuri (mendupilasi) benih dari kebun pemain lain (khusus dari Seed Shop).

Mantis10.name: Praying Mantis (10+)
Mantis10.desc: Memicu mutasi umum (Gold, Rainbow, Shocked, dll.), membuat hasil panen lebih berharga.

Mantis30.name: Praying Mantis (30+)
Mantis30.desc: Memicu mutasi umum (Gold, Rainbow, Shocked, dll.), membuat hasil panen lebih berharga.

Seal.name: Seal
Seal.desc: Saat menjual pet, memiliki peluang 2% untuk mendapatkan kembali pet tersebut dalam bentuk telur.

Macaw.name: Scarlet Macaw
Macaw.desc: Memiliki peluang 15.95% untuk memutasi buah Anda menjadi varian Verdant (nilai 4x) setiap 11.50 menit.

Moon.name: Moon Cat
Moon.desc: Meningkatkan ukuran buah (1.51x) dalam jarak kecil saat tidur setiap 1 menit. Juga membantu buah tipe Moon (Moon Mango, dll.) tetap di pohon setelah dipanen.

Blood.name: Blood Owl
Blood.desc: Membuat semua pet aktif Anda menua lebih cepat (mendapatkan XP lebih banyak).

Night.name: Night Owl
Night.desc: Memberikan tambahan XP kepada semua pet aktif sebesar 0.05 hingga 0.25 per detik.

Owl.name: Owl
Owl.desc: Memberikan tambahan 0.22 XP/detik kepada semua pet.

Peacock.name: Peacock
Peacock.desc: Mengurangi cooldown kemampuan pet aktif (info lebih detail belum ditemukan).

Dragonfly.name: Dragonfly
Dragonfly.desc: Memberikan mutasi Gold pada buah acak setiap 5 menit (nilai 20x lebih tinggi).

Raccoon.name: Raccoon
Raccoon.desc: Memberikan buah gratis setiap 15 menit dengan mengkloning buah dari kebun tetangga.

Butterfly.name: Butterfly
Butterfly.desc: Menerapkan mutasi Rainbow (50x) pada tanaman dengan 5 mutasi setiap 30 menit (melewati yang difavoritkan).

MimicOctopus.name: Mimic Octopus
MimicOctopus.desc: Meniru kemampuan pet aktif lainnya. Terbaik saat dipasangkan dengan pet S-tier lainnya.

ToucanRandom.name: Toucan (Random)
ToucanRandom.desc: Meningkatkan ukuran dan peluang mutasi varian pada tanaman tropis di dekatnya, menjadikannya ideal untuk kebun yang berfokus pada mutasi.

ToucanGemuk.name: Toucan (Gemuk)
ToucanGemuk.desc: Meningkatkan ukuran dan peluang mutasi varian pada tanaman tropis di dekatnya, menjadikannya ideal untuk kebun yang berfokus pada mutasi.

ChickenZombie.name: Chicken Zombie (Random)
ChickenZombie.desc: Memberikan mutasi "Zombified" (nilai jual 25x) pada tanaman di sekitarnya dan mempercepat penetasan telur. Tanaman yang bermutasi akan memiliki aura hijau kabur.

DB.name: Disco Bee
DB.desc: Every ~20 minutes, has a 12.28% chance to activate a Disco mutation (125x value) on nearby fruits.

QB.name: Queen Bee
QB.desc: Every ~25 minutes, applies Pollinated mutation to surrounding fruits and resets the highest cooldown pet ability.

Redfox.name: Red Fox
Redfox.desc: Steals (duplicates) seeds from other players' farms (Seed Shop only).

Red Fox (Random).name: Red Fox (Random)
Red Fox (Random).desc: Steals (duplicates) seeds from other players' farms (Seed Shop only).

Mantis10.name: Praying Mantis (10+)
Mantis10.desc: Triggers common mutations (Gold, Rainbow, Shocked, etc.), making crops more valuable.

Mantis30.name: Praying Mantis (30+)
Mantis30.desc: Triggers common mutations (Gold, Rainbow, Shocked, etc.), making crops more valuable.

Seal.name: Seal
Seal.desc: When selling a pet, has a 2% chance to get the pet back as an egg.

Macaw.name: Scarlet Macaw
Macaw.desc: Has a 15.95% chance to mutate your fruit into a Verdant variant (4x value) every 11.50 minutes.

Moon.name: Moon Cat
Moon.desc: Increases fruit size (1.51x) within a small range while napping every 1 minute. Also helps Moon-type fruits (Moon Mango, etc.) stay on the plant after picking.

Blood.name: Blood Owl
Blood.desc: Makes all your active pets age faster (gain more XP).

Night.name: Night Owl
Night.desc: Grants 0.05 to 0.25 additional XP/second to all active pets.

Owl.name: Owl
Owl.desc: Grants 0.22 additional XP/second to all pets.

Peacock.name: Peacock
Peacock.desc: Reduces the cooldown of active pet abilities (more details not found).

Dragonfly.name: Dragonfly
Dragonfly.desc: Gives a guaranteed Gold plant every 5 minutes (worth 20x more).

Raccoon.name: Raccoon
Raccoon.desc: Gives free fruit every 15 minutes by cloning one from a neighbor's garden.

Butterfly.name: Butterfly
Butterfly.desc: Applies Rainbow mutation (50x) to plants with five mutations every 30 minutes (skips favorited ones).

MimicOctopus.name: Mimic Octopus
MimicOctopus.desc: Mimics the ability of an active pet. Best when paired with other S-tier animals.

ToucanRandom.name: Toucan (Random)
ToucanRandom.desc: Increases the size and variant mutation chance of nearby tropical plants, making it ideal for mutation-focused gardens.

ToucanGemuk.name: Toucan (Fat)
ToucanGemuk.desc: Increases the size and variant mutation chance of nearby tropical plants, making it ideal for mutation-focused gardens.

ChickenZombie.name: Chicken Zombie (Random)
ChickenZombie.desc: Applies a "Zombified" mutation (25x sell value) to nearby plants and speeds up egg hatching. Mutated plants will have a hazy green aura.
